Package dao

Class DivisionsDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.DivisionsDAO
public class DivisionsDAO extends Object
DAO class responsible for database operations related to the first_level_divisions table.

  • Method Details

    • getDivisionByCountry

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getDivisionByCountry(String selectedCountry) throws SQLException
      Method to create a list of the divisions corresponding to the selected country. There are 3 countries and when one is selected it returns a list of all divisions associating with the country ID.
      Parameters:
      selectedCountry -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getDivisionIdByName

      public int getDivisionIdByName(String divisionName) throws SQLException
      Method to retrieve division ID by name. This is so when a customer is added, the selected division is converted from plain text back into it's division ID. It allows the user to not have to memorize the different division ID's and what they correspond too (e.g. Alabama's division ID = 1).
      Parameters:
      divisionName -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      SQLException
